meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be spread or distributed easily.
meanings.sent1: The peanut butter's spreadability made it effortless to cover the entire slice of bread.
meanings.sent2: I love the jam's spreadability on my toast every morning.
meanings.sent3: The pancake's spreadability was so good, it practically spread itself!
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a spreadability that touched everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The paint's spreadability was like a smooth river flowing on the canvas.

meanings.definition: The ability of a substance to be easily spread or applied over a surface.
meanings.sent1: The butter's spreadability on the warm muffin was delightful.
meanings.sent2: The lotion's spreadability made it perfect for moisturizing the skin.
meanings.sent3: The glue's spreadability was so good, it stuck everything together in seconds!
meanings.sent4: His charm had a spreadability that won over even the toughest critics.
meanings.sent5: The sauce's spreadability on the pasta was like a delicious blanket of flavor.
